name: John Murphy
title: Entrepreneurship is all about deferred gratification.

answers.answer: CEO of Hello World. Hello World was just an idea which I pitched at the World Convention in 2017. I won the first prize which motivated me to execute my plan. Today I have impacted more than 1 million developers through my startup.
In next few weeks, Hello World would be crossing the mark of 60m+ User base.
I haven't used social media for my product at all. But now I want to start seeing the benefits.
Word of mouth has been the best for me, no social media platform can come close to word of mouth.
Currently I am learning about Instagram as a tool for my business. Let's see where it goes.
Reaching out to masses has always been a problem.
